AliasName.description: String that contains the name of the alias to be modified. The name must start with the word 'alias' followed by a forward slash (alias/). Aliases that begin with 'alias/aws' are reserved.

TargetKeyId.description: Unique identifier of the customer master key to be mapped to the alias. This value can be a globally unique identifier or the fully specified ARN of a key.   Key ARN Example - arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:123456789012:key/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012   Globally Unique Key ID Example - 12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012   You can call ListAliases to verify that the alias is mapped to the correct TargetKeyId.
